title: Filter mode wire frame
description: Draw elements of this filter block in wireframe mode. This mode draws only the edges of the features with the specified edge style.

edges.description: An object defining edges of a feature.

type.description: Declares filter mode of type wire frame.

edges_schema.json.title: Edges
edges_schema.json.description: Edges describe additional styles applied to visually important edges of 3D objects.

sketchEdges_schema.json.title: Sketch Edges
sketchEdges_schema.json.description: The sketch edge rendering configuration of a symbol layer. Edges of type `sketch` are rendered with a hand-drawn look in mind.

extensionLength.description: A size in points by which to extend edges beyond their original end points.

size.description: Edge size in points, positive only

transparency.description: The value has to lie between `100` (full transparency) and `0` (full opacity).

color_schema.json.title: color
color_schema.json.description: Color is represented as a three or four-element array. The four elements represent values for red, green, blue, and alpha in that order. Values range from 0 through 255. If color is undefined for a symbol, the color value is null.

solidEdges_schema.json.title: Solid Edges
solidEdges_schema.json.description: The solid edge rendering configuration of a symbol layer. Edges of type `solid` are rendered in a single color, unaffected by scene lighting.

extensionLength.description: A size in points by which to extend edges beyond their original end points.

size.description: Edge size in points, positive only

transparency.description: The value has to lie between `100` (full transparency) and `0` (full opacity).
